postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y ffmpeg && npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code && sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.claude && mkdir -p ~/.claude && echo 'echo $ANTHROPIC_API_KEY' > ~/.claude/api_key_helper.sh && chmod +x ~/.claude/api_key_helper.sh && echo '{"apiKeyHelper": "/home/vscode/.claude/api_key_helper.sh"}' > ~/.claude/settings.json && uv sync --group dev
postAttachCommand: mkdir -p ~/.ssh && chmod 700 ~/.ssh && find ~/.ssh -maxdepth 1 -type f -exec chmod 600 {} + 2>/dev/null || true
